mapper.select: SELECT post.postId, user.user_nickname, post.content, post.reg_date, comment.commentCount , likes.likesCount, user.profilimg, postImg.imgURI FROM tb_post AS post INNER JOIN tb_user AS user ON post.user_id = user.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT postId, COUNT(*) AS commentCount FROM tb_comment GROUP BY postId) AS comment ON post.postId = comment.postId LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT postId, COUNT(*) AS likesCount FROM tb_likes GROUP BY postId) AS likes ON post.postId = likes.postId LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT postImg.postId, postImg.imgURI FROM ( SELECT postimgmapping.postId, postimg.imgURI, CASE WHEN @GRP = postimgmapping.postId THEN @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM + 1 ELSE @ROWNUM :=1 END AS ROWNUM , (@GRP := postimgmapping.postId) AS dummy FROM tb_postimg AS postimg INNER JOIN tb_postimgmapping AS postimgmapping ON postimg.imgNo = postimgmapping.imgNo ,(SELECT @ROWNUM:=0, @GRP:='') AS temp ) AS postImg WHERE postImg.ROWNUM = 1 ) AS postImg ON post.postId = postImg.postId WHERE isDelete = 0 AND isBlind = 0 ORDER BY reg_Date DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{pageNo}
